name: Teeny Titans: Teen Titans Go!
summary:
In Teeny Titans, Go! you will join Robin for a figure battling RPG of epic proportions.
Assemble your squad and face off in 3-on-3 battles! Bust out super moves in real time with the battle bar. Switch between your heroes to launch awesome attacks and take down your opponents.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Teeny Titans | LET'S PLAY | Cartoon Network
